**The Davidson Real Estate Group** is the premier Las Vegas real estate team with a proven track record of success using custom high impact marketing strategies, hard work, and the knowledge and expertise that comes with nearly 20 years of experience in the real estate and mortgage industries. My team and I can help you successfully sell and/or buy anywhere in the Valley. From traditional sales, short sales and foreclosures, probate sales, high rise properties, first time home buyers, seasoned real estate clients, and real estate investors we‚Äôve done just about everything.

We will always put our client‚Äôs interests first and it would be our pleasure to help you achieve your real estate goals. We understand that every client has different goals, time frames, concerns, and sometimes issues to overcome in order to move forward. When we start working together we will create a personalized strategic plan to help you reach your goal, and we will work at your pace and in the time frame that works best for you.

## Listing Your Property

The decision to sell is a big one, let us help!

### The Selling Process

Our strategic process and high impact marketing will help you to sell your home as quickly and for as much money as possible with minimal stress.

## What's Your Home Worth?

Setting the Right Price Matters

### FREE Home Valuation

We are here to get your house aggressively marketed to sell as quickly as possible and for the best price!

## Buying a New Home

We have helped hundreds of buyers!

### The Buying Process

Our goal is simply to ensure that we help you find the perfect home, and that achieve this as efficiently and stress free for you as possible.

## Mortgage Calculator

Please use our tools to make your home search and buying experience as stress free and rewarding for you and your family as possible.
